# hv_vm_config_get_el2_supported(_:)

**Function**

Returns a status value that indicates whether the current platform supports Exception Level 2 (EL2).

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vm_config_get_el2_supported(_ el2_supported: UnsafeMutablePointer<Bool>) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **el2_supported**: A pointer to a Boolean value that indicates whether the current platform supports EL2. The framework writes this value on success; otherwise, `nil`.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/HV_SUCCESS] if the operation was successful, otherwise an error code specified in [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t].

## Nested virtualization

- **hv_vm_config_get_el2_enabled(_:_:)**: Return a status value that indicates whether the VM configuration enables support for Exception Level 2 (EL2).
- **hv_vm_config_set_el2_enabled(_:_:)**: Sets whether the specified VM configuration enables support for Exception Level 2 (EL2).
